text: Goku is a fictional character. He is the protagonist of the manga and anime Dragon Ball created by Akira Toriyama. He is a Saiyan who likes having a great challenge towards enemies. == Appearances == Goku is the main protagonist of the Dragon Ball franchise, which started December 3, 1984. He starts off as young boy and meets a teenage girl named Bulma. Category:Dragon Ball characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1984
title: Goku
